sentences.en: " Good - night, " he said , simulating an easy friendliness.
sentences.cn: “ 晚安, " 他装出轻松友好的神气说道.

sentences.en: Behind the mask of friendliness, I know he really dislikes me.
sentences.cn: 在友善的面具后面, 我知道他其实并不喜欢我.

sentences.en: But American friendliness is not always an offer of true friendship.
sentences.cn: 然而美国人的友好并不总是真正友情的表示。

sentences.en: Despite his outward display of friendliness, I sensed he was concealing something.
sentences.cn: 尽管他表现得友善, 我还是感觉到他有所隐瞒.

sentences.en: He read love into her casual friendliness.
sentences.cn: 他把她偶然表示的友好误解为爱情.

sentences.en: His kind smile soon generated friendliness.
sentences.cn: 他友善的微笑很快造成了友好的气氛。

sentences.en: His manner was a blend of friendliness and respect.
sentences.cn: 他的态度友善且毕恭毕敬.

sentences.en: Instinct told him that phony friendliness would not deceive this girl.
sentences.cn: 直觉告诉他,佯装友好骗不了这女孩儿.

sentences.en: Piggy saw the smile and misinterpreted it as friendliness.
sentences.cn: 猪崽子看到微笑,却误以为是友好的表示.

sentences.en: She also loves the friendliness of the people.
The enemy mask their enmity under an appearance of friendliness.
sentences.cn: 敌人用友好的外表来掩饰内心的敌意.

sentences.en: The friendliness was gone from his voice.

sentences.cn: 他们的友善态度只不过是装出来的。

sentences.en: There was a sincere expression of friendliness on both their faces.
sentences.cn: 他们俩的脸上都流露出真挚友好的表情。

sentences.en: We felt the salesman's synthetic friendliness.
sentences.cn: 我们感觉到那位销售员的虚情假意.

sentences.en: You will find the dog's tractability and friendliness.
sentences.cn: 你会发现狗既温顺又友好。
